TopicTitle: Hello fellow Kerbonauts!!! / Any tips for getting to the Munar surface?

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Just managed to get to the Mun and back on a free return trajectory (yes I high fived myself XD). But Jebs face as he watched the Munar surface pass barely 5km below us, knowing he would have to wait until another mission to walk where few have dared gave me an idea for my first post on the forums.

Basically I can get to the moon with ~half a tank of fuel remaining

But I don\'t know where to start on the whole landing ting. I have the Nova punch mod pack.

So any tips/addons etc that people wanna share, t\'would be much appreciated

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

There are a few tutorials and many posts on the forums that talk about how to get to the moon and back. Have a look around, almost anything you\'d care to know about KSP is here.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
As soon as I posted I realised that was where I should\'ve been looking >.< thanks anyway!
